string-array.name: about_response
string-array.item: My name is HomeVoice and I\'m your personal assistant.
I\'m your personal assistant, I\'m HomeVoice.
Call me HomeVoice, I\'m your personal assistant.
I\'m HomeVoice, the butler of your smart home.

string-array.name: abilities_response
string-array.item: I can control and secure you smart home.
I control all smart devices at your home.
There\'s almost nothing I couldn\'t do for your smart home.

string-array.name: room_count_response
string-array.item: Your smart home consists of %1$s rooms.
You have %1$s rooms in your smart home.
There are %1$s rooms in your smart home.

string-array.name: room_list_response
string-array.item: Here is the list of your rooms:

string-array.name: repeated_time_query
string-array.item: You\'re really interested in time, aren\'t you?
It\'s the same time it was few seconds ago.
The time hasn\'t changed since your last query.
It\'s not funny to ask for the time again.

string-array.name: compliment_response
string-array.item: Thank you. That\'s very kind of you.

string-array.name: criticism_response
string-array.item: I hope you can forgive me.

string-array.name: fault_description_request
string-array.item: Could you please explain what is wrong?
Please explain what I did wrong.
How could I do it better?
Can you please describe my fault?

string-array.name: multiple_lights_response
string-array.item: There are multiple lights at your smart home.
Your smart home contains multiple lights.

string-array.name: not_available_singular
string-array.item: I can\'t see any %1$s in your %2$s.
You don\'t have any %1$s in your %2$s.
It seems You don\'t have any %1$s in your %2$s.

string-array.name: not_available_plural
string-array.item: I can\'t see any %1$s in your %2$s.
You don\'t have any %1$s in your %2$s.
It seems You don\'t have any %1$s in your %2$s.

string-array.name: turned_on_off
string-array.item: I just turned the %1$s %2$s in your %3$s.
The %1$s has just been turned %2$s in your %3$s.

string-array.name: turned_on_off_already
string-array.item: The %1$s has already been turned %2$s in your %3$s.

string-array.name: set_level
string-array.item: I just set the %1$s level %2$s in your %3$s.
I set the %1$s level %2$s in your %3$s.
The %1$s level has just been set %2$s in your %3$s.

string-array.name: set_level_already
string-array.item: The %1$s has already been set %2$s in your %3$s.

string-array.name: select_location
string-array.item: Please, select one or more locations.

string-array.name: what_query
string-array.item: What would you like to know about %1$s?
How can I help you with %1$s?

string-array.name: unknown
string-array.item: I\'m not sure, what you meant.
I\'m sorry, but I didn\'t understand.
